001    package tv.freewheel.renderers.interfaces;
002    
003    import java.util.HashMap;
004    
005    /**
006     *      Interface for renderer to implement.
007     */
008    public interface IRenderer {
009            /**
010             *      Notify the renderer to initialize and to load the creative.
011             *
012             *      @param rendererContext reference to IRendererContext
013             *      
014             *      Note: <br>
015             *              AdManager expect the EVENT_AD_LOADED be dispatched when load staff done.
016             *      
017             */
018            public void load(IRendererContext rendererContext);
019            
020            /**
021             *      Notify the renderer to start ad playback.
022             *      
023             *      Note: <br>
024             *              AdManager expect the EVENT_AD_STARTED be dispatched when ad showed on UI.
025             *      
026             */
027            public void start();
028            
029            /**
030             *      Notify the renderer to start pause playback.
031             *      
032             *      Note: <br>
033             *              AdManager expect the EVENT_AD_PAUSE be dispatched when ad paused.
034             *      
035             */
036            public void pause();
037            
038            /**
039             *      Notify the renderer to start resume playback.
040             *      
041             *      Note: <br>
042             *              AdManager expect the EVENT_AD_RESUME be dispatched when ad resumed.
043             *      
044             */
045            public void resume();
046            
047            /**
048             *      Notify the renderer to stop ad playback.
049             *      
050             *      Usage:
051             *              AdManager expect the EVENT_AD_STOPPED be dispatched when ad complete stopped.
052             *      
053             */
054            public void stop();
055            
056            /**
057             *      Notify the renderer to dispose and release resources.
058             *      
059             *      Note: <br>
060             *              After this call AdManager will not use this renderer anymore.
061             *      
062             */
063            public void dispose();
064            
065            /**
066             *      Get duration of the ad.
067             *
068             *      @return a number in seconds, which is greater than or equal to 0, but if not available return -1
069             */
070            public double getDuration();
071            
072            /**
073             *      Get playheadTime of the ad.
074             *
075             *      @return a number in seconds, which is greater than or equal to 0, but if not available return -1
076             */
077            public double getPlayheadTime();
078            
079            /**
080             *      Get module info. The returned dictionary should contain key INFO_KEY_MODULE_TYPE with MODULE_TYPE_* value.
081             */
082            public HashMap<String, String> getModuleInfo();
083            
084            /**
085             * This method will be invoked when player changes the size of temporal ad container. 
086             * This will also be invoked when player changes the temporal ad container to another one, which is returned by ISlot.getBase(). 
087             * Renderer should change the ad size according to the new display base via  slot.getWidth() and slot.getHeight().
088             */
089            public void resize();
090    }
